metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7282 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In NetKit through 0.17, rcp.c in the rcp client allows remote rsh serversto bypass intended access restrictions via the filename of . or an emptyfilename. The impact is modifying the permissions of the target directoryon the client side. This is similar to CVE-2018-20685.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7282` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsh-client - 0.17-21
rsh-server - 0.17-21
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netkit-rsh package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.17-21').
